title: Nangni chhandam fate tho ru
lyrics:
Nangni chhandam fate tho r'u,
Hruaitu Krista belte chu;
Harh r'u, aw, hnam ropuite u,
Ralin Zion an thlen hma hian.

Pathian thu hlu chu puang chhuak r'u,
Tuipui, khawpui ri angin;
Kan sual Tlantu Krista zarah,
Ropuia ngamtu kan ni.

Kan hmaa mi huai kalte kha,
An ding nghet he hmunah hian;
An puanzar an thing e, en r'u,
Isua zara hnehtuten.

Thihnate hlau tawp lo turin,
Kan nunna thuhruk a ni;
Amah a lan hun apiangah,
Ropuiin kan lang ve ang.

Ama hmaah kan ding theuh vang,
A ropuizia hre turin;
Amah chawimawiin kan fak ang,
Kan lawmmante hmu theuhvin.
